diseases.name: Turcicum Leaf Blight (Exserohilum turcicum)
diseases.symptoms: Large, elongated lesions with gray centers and dark borders.
diseases.control: Use resistant hybrids, fungicide treatments, and crop rotation.

diseases.name: Southern Corn Leaf Blight (Cochliobolus heterostrophus)
diseases.symptoms: Narrow lesions on leaves, which may turn yellow or brown.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, fungicides, and avoid excessive moisture.

diseases.name: Charcoal Rot (Macrophomina phaseolina)
diseases.symptoms: Wilting, stunted growth, and a characteristic black mold in roots.
diseases.control: Use well-drained soils, practice crop rotation, and adopt resistant hybrids.

diseases.name: Blast Disease (Pyricularia oryzae)
diseases.symptoms: Grayish lesions on leaves, which develop into holes.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, fungicides, and proper field management practices.

diseases.name: Bacterial Blight (Xanthomonas oryzae)
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing and wilting of leaves, water-soaked lesions.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, avoid infected seeds, and adopt proper irrigation practices.

diseases.name: Rice Sheath Blight (Rhizoctonia solani)
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves that turn grayish-brown.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, fungicide treatment, and improve air circulation.

diseases.name: Rust (Puccinia spp.)
diseases.symptoms: Small, orange pustules on leaves and stems.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, timely fungicide application, and crop rotation.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt (Fusarium oxysporum)
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves and stunted growth.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, soil treatment, and proper drainage.

diseases.name: Ascochyta Blight (Ascochyta rabiei)
diseases.symptoms: Dark lesions on stems and leaves, often with a sunken center.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, and fungicide treatments.

diseases.name: Rust (Puccinia spp.)
diseases.symptoms: Small reddish or orange pustules on leaves, stems, and heads.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, timely fungicide application.

diseases.name: Bacterial Leaf Blight (Xanthomonas campestris)
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves turning yellow and wilting.
diseases.control: Use disease-free seeds, crop rotation, and resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt (Fusarium oxysporum)
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, stunted growth, and premature death of the plant.
diseases.control: Avoid waterlogging, use resistant varieties, and proper soil management.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew (Peronosclerospora sorghi)
diseases.symptoms: Yellow streaks on leaves, which later turn into white fungal growth.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, early planting, and seed treatment with fungicides.

diseases.name: Ergot (Claviceps africana)
diseases.symptoms: Swollen, hardened fungal growth on flowers, affecting seed quality.
diseases.control: Remove infected plants, use fungicides, and avoid excessive moisture.

diseases.name: Anthracnose (Colletotrichum graminicola)
diseases.symptoms: Dark lesions on stems, leaves, and seeds.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, and fungicide treatment.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew (Sclerospora graminicola)
diseases.symptoms: Yellow streaks on leaves and white fungal growth.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, fungicide application, and proper field hygiene.

diseases.name: Blast (Pyricularia grisea)
diseases.symptoms: Small, round lesions with grayish centers.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, and fungicides.

diseases.name: Leaf Spot (Alternaria spp.)
diseases.symptoms: Circular spots with dark centers on leaves.
diseases.control: Fungicide application and removing infected plant debris.

diseases.name: Early Leaf Spot (Cercospora arachidicola)
diseases.symptoms: Round, brown spots with yellow halos on leaves.
diseases.control: Fungicide application, crop rotation, and resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Tikka Disease (Cercospora personata)
diseases.symptoms: Lesions on leaves, stems, and pods; dark brown spots.
diseases.control: Use resistant varieties, proper crop rotation, and fungicide treatments.

diseases.name: Root Rot (Fusarium solani)
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, wilting, and stunted growth.
diseases.control: Use disease-free seeds, proper irrigation management, and soil treatment.
